description: Try this plant-based burger recipe with delicious black bean and beetroot patties and crisp lettuce leaf 'buns' for a healthier burger option.
keywords: Vegie burger,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Plant-based,Spring,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,Vegetarian,Vegan,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Beetroot
name: Bunless Black Bean & Beetroot Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place maple syrup, vinegar, cucumber and half the coriander in a small bowl and stir to combine. Set aside until required.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook burgers for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and warmed through, adding onion to pan for last 4 minutes of cooking to soften.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt and remaining coriander in a small bowl. Season.

Drain cucumber. Place half the lettuce leaves on a clean surface, then top with burgers, tomato, onion, cucumber, a drizzle of yoghurt mixture and extra coriander. Sandwich with remaining lettuce leaves and serve.
